events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer role, and all submitted documents appear complete and in order.
The candidate's application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to keywords including software engineer and developer experience.
A recruiter specializing in technical hires has been assigned to manage the candidate's progression in the recruitment process.
The candidate passed the initial screening, demonstrating strong knowledge of software development principles and relevant experience.
The candidate has responded promptly and positively to the interview invitation, confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been successfully scheduled for May 18th at 10:00 AM to assess coding and system design skills.
Candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance, showing proficiency in algorithms and problem-solving.
HR interview has been scheduled for May 21st to discuss candidate's cultural fit and overall career goals within the organization.
